prefsnologintext2: Pleez laag een fu chienj yu prefrens dem.
prefsnologintext2-for-temp-user: Pleez mek wan akount fu chienj prefrens dem.
prefs-tabs-navigation-hint: Tip: Yu kyaan yuuz de lef an rait arow kee dem fu luk roun de taab dem een de tab lis.
prefs-sections-navigation-hint: Tip: Yu kyaan yuuz de Tab an Shif + Tab kee dem fu luk roun de prefrens sexhan dem.
prefs-description-personal: Kontrol how yu luk, konek, an taak fu naiga dem.
prefs-help-realname: Yu no hafu gib yu reel niem. If yu gib, aawi kyaan yuuz yu niem do aatribyuushan fu yu wuk.
passwordtooshort: Paaswud hafu be a de muos likl {{PLURAL:$1|1 karikta|$1 karikta dem}}.
passwordtoolong: Paaswud dem kyaant be biga fu {{PLURAL:$1|1 karikta|$1 karikta dem}}.
password-substring-username-match: Yu paaswud kyaan be een yu yuuzaniem.
password-name-match: Yu paaswud hafu be difran fram yu yuuzaniem.
password-login-forbidden: De yuus a dis yuuzaniem and paaswud gainst de ruul dem.
passwordincommonlist: Dis paaswud bad bad. Chuuz wan muo yuuneek paaswud.
prefs-help-yourpassword: Akount-git-bak lowd. See $1 fu muo setin dem.
tog-prefershttps: Yu hafu yuuz wan sekyur konexhan wen laag een
prefs-help-prefershttps: Did prefrens go eena efek pan yu nex laag een.
prefs-user-downloaddata-info: Mi akount dieta fram dis prajek
prefs-user-restoreprefs-info: Bring bak aal faktri setin dem (een aal sexhan dem)
yourgender: How yu wan naiga dem fu kaal yu:
gender-unknown: Wen taakin bout yuh, de saafwier wil yuuz genda nuutral wud dem wen paasibl.
prefs-help-gender:
Setin dis prefrens aapshanal.
Dis saafwier yuuz ee valyuu fu aadres yu an fu menshan yu fu oda naiga dem yuuzin de rait gramatik'l genda.
Dis infaamieshan wil go poblik.
prefs-help-variant: De awtagrafee yu wan fu see dis wiki een.
tog-fancysig: Treet signicha laik wikitext (widout wan aatomatik link fi yu yuuzapiej)
prefs-help-signature: Kaament pan big task piej shud be min sain wid "<nowiki>~~~~</nowiki>", wich wil be put een yu signicha a put wan taimstamp.
prefs-signature-invalid-warning: Yu signicha bad bad fu som tuul dem.
prefs-signature-invalid-new: Yu signicha a invaalid. Yu kyaan yuuz it but yu kyaant chienj um til yu fix ee.
prefs-signature-invalid-disallow: Yu signicha bad bad. Til yu fix it, de faktri signicha be yuuz pan yu kament dem.
badsig: Bad raa signicha. Chek pan de HTML tag dem.
badsiglength:
Yu signikcha a tuu big.
Um kyaan be biga fu $1 {{PLURAL:$1|karikta|kartika dem}} big.
badsigsubst: Yu signikcha hab min nest substityuushan (e.g. subst: a ~~~~).
badsightml: Yu signikcha hab bad bad a oul' HTML sintax:
badsiglinks: Yu signikcha hafu hab wan link fu yu yuuza piej, taak piej, a kaantribyuushaan pan dis wiki. Pleez aad um, fu exampl: $1.
badsiglinebreak: Yu signikcha hafu hab wan singl lain a wikitex.
prefs-changeemail: Chienj a mash up email adres
prefs-help-email: Email adres yu no hafu put, but yu hafu hab um fu paaswud mash up, a yu faaget yu paaswud.
prefs-help-email-required: Yu hafu hab wan email adres.
prefs-help-email-others:
Yu kyaan aaso chuuz fu let oda dem taak fu yu wid email chruu wan link pan yu yuuza a taak piej.
Yu email adres a not shuo wen oda yuuza dem taak fu yu.
tog-requireemail: Sen paaswud mash up email dem onglee wen buot email adres an yuuzaniem min gib
prefs-help-requireemail: Dis mek praivasi beka an staap bad-bad email dem.
noemailprefs: Put wan email adres een yu prefrens dem fu de ting dem fu wuk.
emailnotauthenticated: Yu email adres no kanfirm. No email go sen fu enee a de folowin feecha dem.
emailauthenticated: Yu email adres min kanfirm pan $2 a $3.
allowemail: Let oda yuuza dem fu email mi
email-allow-new-users-label: Let email dem fram nyuu yuuza dem
prefs-help-email-allow-new-users: Klikin dis let yuuza dat no [[{{MediaWiki:grouppage-autoconfirmed}}|aatokanfirm]] fu sen email dem.
tog-ccmeonemails: Sen me kaapee dem a email mi sen fu oda yuuza dem
email-mutelist-label: Baan dis yah yuuza (dem) fram emailin me:
tog-enotifwatchlistpages: Email mi aata piej a pikcha een mi wachlis go chienj
tog-enotifusertalkpages: Email mi aata mi yuuza big taak piej min chienj
tog-enotifminoredits: Email me aaso fu likl chienj dem a piej dem an pikcha dem
tog-enotifrevealaddr: Shuo mi email adres een notifikieshan email dem
prefs-description-rendering: Chienj 'kin, saiz, and reedin apshan dem.
prefs-custom-cssjs-safemode: Yu own CSS/JavaScript put arf kuz sief muod put arf. Pleez [[#mw-input-wpforcesafemode|mash up sief muod]] fu yuuz yu own CSS/JaavaSkrip.
prefs-help-skin-responsive: Aadap lieowt fu skreen saiz pan mobil.
timezoneuseserverdefault: Yuuz wiki faktri setin fu dis ($1)
timezone-invalid: Bad-bad taim zuon a taim aafset.
imagemaxsize: Pikcha saiz limit pan fail deskripshan piej dem:
tog-diffonly: No shuo piej kantent dung dif dem
tog-norollbackdiff: No shuo dif aata doin wan rolbak
tog-showrollbackconfirmation: Shuo wan kanfamieshan praamp wen klikin wan rolbak link
prefs-help-forcesafemode: Kil pan-wiki skrip dem an stailsheet dem.
prefs-description-editing: Chienj how yu mek, traak, and re-luk pan chienj dem.
tog-editsectiononrightclick: Put aan sexhan editin bai rait klikin pan sexhan niem dem
tog-editondblclick: Chienj piej dem pan dubl klik
tog-minordefault: Maak aal chienj dem likl bai defaalt
tog-forceeditsummary: Tel mi wen putin wan blienk sumari (a de naam'l undo sumari)
tog-editrecovery-help: Yu kyaan gib feedbak pan de [$1 praajek taak piej].
tog-useeditwarning: Tel mi wen mi gwarn fram wan chienj piej wid no-keep chienj dem
tog-previewonfirst: Shuo pree-luk wen me staat fu chienj
tog-uselivepreview: Shuo pree-luk widowt reluodin de piej
prefs-description-rc: Mek de nyuu chienj feed yu own.
recentchangesdays: Die fu shuo een nyuu chienj dem:
recentchangescount: Numba a chienj dem fu shuo een nyuu chienj dem, piej istori dem, an een laag dem, naamali:
tog-usenewrc: Gruup chienj dem bai piej een nyuu chienj dem an wachlis
rcfilters-preference-help: Luod [[{{#special:RecentChanges}}|nyuu chienj dem]] an [[{{#special:RecentChangesLinked}}|simila chienj dem]] widowt de filta sarch a de hailaitin funxhanalitee.
tog-hideminor: Haid likl chienj dem fram nyuu chienj dem
tog-hidepatrolled: Haid patrol chienj dem fram nyuu chienj dem
tog-newpageshidepatrolled: Haid patrol piej fram nyuu piej lis
tog-shownumberswatching: Shuo de numba a wachin yuuza dem
prefs-description-watchlist: Manie an mek de lis a piej dem yu traak yu own.
prefs-editwatchlist-label: Chienj entree dem pan yu wachlis:
prefs-editwatchlist-edit: Luk an mash up niem dem pan yu wachlis
prefs-watchlist-days: Die dem fu shuo eena wachlis:
prefs-watchlist-edits: Hai'is numba a chienj dem fu shuo een wachlis:
tog-extendwatchlist: Mek wachlis big-big fu shuo aal chienj dem, no jus de nyuuis
tog-watchlistunwatchlinks: Aad dairek unwach/wach maaka ({{int:Watchlist-unwatch}}/{{int:Watchlist-unwatch-undo}}) fu min wach piej wid chienj dem (JaavaSkrip hafu hab fu taagl wuk)
rcfilters-watchlist-preference-help: Luod [[{{#special:Watchlist}}|wachlis]] wid no filta dem sarch a hailaitin funxhanalitee.
tog-watchstar-expiry: Naam'l taim friem een wachlis fu yuuman-mek piej dem:
tog-watchlisthideminor: Haid likl chienj dem fram de wachlis
tog-watchlisthidebots: Haid baat chienj dem fram de wachlis
tog-watchlisthideown: Haid mi chienj dem fram de wachlis
tog-watchlisthideanons: Haid chienj dem bai no-laag een yuuza dem fram de wachlis
tog-watchlisthideliu: Haid chienj dem bai laag een yuuza dem fram de wachlis
tog-watchlistreloadautomatically: Reluod de wachlis aatamatiklee wen wan filta go chienj (yu hafu hab JaavaSkrip)
tog-watchlisthidepatrolled: Haid patrol chienj fram de wachlis
tog-watchdefault: Aad piej an fail dem mi chienj fu mi wachlis
tog-watchmoves: Aad piej dem and fail dem mi muuv fu mi wachlis
tog-watchdeletion: Aad piej dem an fail dem mi kil fu mi wachlis
tog-watchcreations: Aad piej mi mek an fails mi put up fu mi wachlis
tog-watchuploads: Aad nyuu fail dem mi upluod fu me wachlis
tog-watchrollback: Aad piej dem dat mi rolbak fu me wachlis
prefs-help-tokenmanagement: Yu kyaan luk an kil de seekrit kee fu yu akount dat kyaan axes de Web feed a yu wachlis. Eneewan dat knuo de kee kyaan luk pan yu wachlis- keep um wan seekrit.
prefs-description-searchoptions: Chuuz de wukin dem a aatokompleet an result dem.
searchlimit-label: Numba a sarch result dem fu shuo pan eech piej:
search-thumbnail-extra-namespaces-label: Shuo tumbniel dem een Special:Sarch pan Desktaap
search-thumbnail-extra-namespaces-messag: Shuo tumbniel dem fu $1 {{PLURAL:$2|niemspies|niemspies dem}} result dem pan de {{#special:search}} piej
prefs-reset-intro: Yu kyaan yuuz dis piej fu kil yu setin dem fu de faktri setin dem. Yu kyaant go bak.
prefs-reset-confirm: Yes, mi wan fu kil me setin dem.
restoreprefs: Put bak aal faktri setin dem.
